data.eml:eml: Revision of the Asian spider genus Pandava Lehtinen (Araneae: Titanoecidae): description of five new species and first record of Titanoecidae from Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Almeida-Silva, Lina M., Griswold, Charles E., Brescovit, Antonio D. (2010): Revision of the Asian spider genus Pandava Lehtinen (Araneae: Titanoecidae): description of five new species and first record of Titanoecidae from Africa. Zootaxa 2630: 30-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276087
